Text: A tea pet, also known as a tea lover's pet, is a small clay figure which is kept by some tea drinkers for good luck.
Triplets:<tea pet
1:
--------------------
Text: Tea pet:  The history of tea pets can be traced back to the Yuan dynasty (1206–1368).
Triplets:<Tea pet
2:
--------------------
<Text: Tea pet:  They are usually made of "zisha" or Yixing clay, from the region near Yixing in Jiangsu province, China.>
Triplets:<They
3:
--------------------
Text: Tea pet:  Just like Yixing teapots made of the same clay, tea pets are unglazed, so that they are mostly monochromatic with a rough surface.
Triplets:<tea pets
